title: Kanye West and his Slavery comment, Daz from Tha Dogg Pound on the LA Sheriff's radar,  Dave Chappelle supports Michelle Wolf, and more.
itunes:title: Kanye West and his Slavery comment, Daz from Tha Dogg Pound on the LA Sheriff's radar,  Dave Chappelle supports Michelle Wolf, and more.
description:
Kanye West is in SUPER hot water for his comment regarding slavery. Daz from Tha Dogg Pound is feeling some kind of way towards Kanye. Dave Chappelle completely respects Michelle Wolf. The Closing Remarks tells us how to deal with haters from time to time and more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
